casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 12, 2007

[Cite as 01/12/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-0hio-105.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-2407. Plough v. Lavelle.

Portage App. No. 2005-P-0083, 2006-0hio-6200. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellants’ expedited motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
